mapper.select: SELECT PRDT_CD , EXC_SN , HGRK_TR_SN , SCX_DCD , RDMP_TMRD , PRAR_DT , PRAR_PRNA , STRT_DT , END_DT , RDMP_PRAR_INTR , PRCS_CPLT_YN , PRCS_DT , PRCS_AMT , PRCS_INTR_AMT , APLY_IRT , OVDU_INTR_RT , TRCH_DCD , TR_SN , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID FROM IBIMS403H WHERE PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} /* 상품코드 */ AND EXC_SN = #{excSn} /* 실행일련번호 */ AND HGRK_TR_SN = (SELECT MAX(HGRK_TR_SN) FROM IBIMS403H WHERE PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} AND EXC_SN = #{excSn} AND HGRK_TR_SN < #{hgrkTrSn}) /* 상위거래일련번호 */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS403H ( PRDT_CD , EXC_SN , SCX_DCD , RDMP_TMRD , PRAR_DT , PRAR_PRNA , STRT_DT , END_DT , RDMP_PRAR_INTR , PRCS_CPLT_YN , PRCS_DT , PRCS_AMT , PRCS_INTR_AMT , APLY_IRT , OVDU_INTR_RT , TRCH_DCD , TR_SN , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES ( #{prdtCd} , #{excSn} , #{scxDcd} , #{rdmpTmrd} , #{prarDt} , #{prarPrna} , #{strtDt} , #{endDt} , #{rdmpPrarIntr} , #{prcsCpltYn} , #{prcsDt} , #{prcsAmt} , #{prcsIntrAmt} , #{aplyIrt} , #{ovduIntrRt} , #{trchDcd} , #{trSn} , SYSDATE , #{hndEmpno} , #{hndTmnlNo} , #{hndTrId} , #{guid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IBIMS403H SET PRAR_DT = #{prarDt} /* 예정일자 */ , PRAR_PRNA = #{prarPrna} /* 예정원금 */ , STRT_DT = #{strtDt} /* 시작일자 */ , END_DT = #{endDt} /* 종료일자 */ , RDMP_PRAR_INTR = #{rdmpPrarIntr} /* 상환예정이자 */ , PRCS_CPLT_YN = #{prcsCpltYn} /* 처리완료여부 */ , PRCS_DT = #{prcsDt} /* 처리일자 */ , PRCS_AMT = #{prcsAmt} /* 처리금액 */ , PRCS_INTR_AMT = #{prcsIntrAmt} /* 처리이자금액 */ , APLY_IRT = #{aplyIrt} /* 적용이율 */ , OVDU_INTR_RT = #{ovduIntrRt} /* 연체이자율 */ , TRCH_DCD = #{trchDcd} /* 트렌치구분코드 */ , HND_DETL_DTM = SYSDATE /* 조작상세일시 */ WHERE PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} /* 상품코드 */ AND EXC_SN = #{excSn} /* 실행일련번호 */ AND SCX_DCD = #{scxDcd} /* 일정구분코드 */ AND RDMP_TMRD = #{rdmpTmrd} /* 상환회차 */ AND TR_SN = #{trSn} /* 거래일련번호 */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS403H WHERE PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} /* 종목코드 */ AND EXC_SN = #{excSn} /* 실행일련번호 */ AND HGRK_TR_SN = #{hgrkTrSn} /* 거래일련번호 */
